description: This Dart file implements a RealtimeService class for connecting to a server-sent events (SSE) stream, handling real-time data updates via HTTP Streaming. It manages connection setup, event parsing, error handling, and disconnection.

classes.name: RealtimeService
classes.description: A client class for connecting to server-sent events stream, managing reconnections, and parsing incoming data.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Asynchronously establishes a connection to the SSE stream endpoint with provided parameters, error handling, and event callback.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.description: Terminates the SSE connection and cleans up resources.
